raw_text: The infinite application of grammar rules is a common problem of the existing top-down unif icat ion-based generators (Shieber et al, 1989)

raw_text: One of the termination problems Shieber et al (1989) pointed out is in the left-recursive rules

raw_text: The actual realization of the component is based on a constraint-based inheritance algorithm that follows the example of PATR-II (Shieber et al, 1989)

raw_text: The lexicon match is not based on direct unification of the target phrase ' s semantics with that of its head, a fundamental requirement of the bottom-up head-driven algorithm of Shieber et al (1989) and Van Noord (1990)
clean_text: The lexicon match is not based on direct unification of the target phrase's semantics with that of its head, a fundamental requirement of the bottom-up head-driven algorithm of Shieber et al (1989) and Van Noord (1990).
